```{r}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r}
source(here::here("src", "storm_runoff.R"))
```

```{r}
impervious_fraction <- seq(from = 0.6, to = 0.8, by = 0.01)

runoff_volume <- vector(mode = "numeric", length = length(impervious_fraction))

runoff_volume <- predict_runoff(impervious_fraction, 182)


runoff_df <- data.frame(impervious_fraction = impervious_fraction,
                        runoff_volume = runoff_volume)

```

```{r}
runoff_fig <- ggplot(runoff_df, aes(impervious_fraction, runoff_volume)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  labs(x = "Impervious Fraction",
       y = "Runoff Volume (cubic ft)")
runoff_fig
```
```{r}
ggsave(here::here("figs", "runoff_fig.jpeg"), height = 5, width = 8)
```
